resources.string: "Erratic Drummer is an automatic drum pattern generator for progressive musicians. You can customize drum patterns based" "on tempo, length, pattern density, as well as tweek each drum instrument's presence.\n\n" "This is a solo project and is meant to stay free. To keep it a clean experience, annoying ads of" "any kind have been avoided. If Erratic Drummer gives you a kick, or helps you with songwriting ideas, please spend a minute to rate" "it on Google Play!"
